summary: The modal_backward sorry at Construction.lean:220 exists because single-family BMCS cannot prove phi->Box phi (not valid in modal logic). A multi-family construction with modal saturation WOULD make it provable by contraposition. Recommend accepting as architectural limitation since completeness theorems are already SORRY-FREE in their execution path. Tasks 825/826 should address broader saturation infrastructure.

artifacts.summary: Research report analyzing modal_backward sorry, multi-family construction approaches, and recommendation to accept as architectural limitation

partial_progress.details: Research complete - analyzed single-family limitation, multi-family saturation approaches, and existing infrastructure

findings.root_cause: Single-family BMCS cannot prove phi -> Box phi (not valid in modal logic)
findings.current_status: Completeness theorems are SORRY-FREE in their execution path
